description: Worn by those who crossed the threshold of history--it remains a silent reminder that the burden of pioneers is never light.
name: Gear_Armor_Heavy_2ndSwordDivision_Waist

description: The heavy tread of armored boots like these first marched into Lionhold, where the 2nd Sword Division began to carve its legacy.
name: Gear_Armor_Heavy_2ndSwordDivision_Feet

description: Sturdy and unyielding, worn by Kaelar advance troops facing the perils and pitfalls of the ancestral home they never knew.
name: Gear_Armor_Heavy_2ndSwordDivision_Forearms

description: Tempered by honor and worn with pride by the 2nd Sword Division, the first brave souls to return to Verra.
name: Gear_Armor_Heavy_2ndSwordDivision_Chest

description: Once a mantle of command, now a relic of the fallen. The Riverlands have claimed the officer, but not his cloak's resolve.
name: Gear_Armor_Light_2ndSwordDivision_Back

description: Worn by the first Kaelar to draw steel on the world of their Aelan forebears, these gloves bear the silent weight of history in every stitch.
name: Gear_Armor_Heavy_2ndSwordDivision_Hands

description: It was a helm like this that carried the whispers of the Divine Portal's passage, to meet the winds of a new dawn.
name: Gear_Armor_Heavy_2ndSwordDivision_Head

description: Stitched for endurance, these war-pants bear the quiet resilience of the Kaelar soldiers who stepped onto sacred ground with blades bared.
name: Gear_Armor_Heavy_2ndSwordDivision_Legs

description: Pauldrons like these carried the weight of command and battle alike, as the first line of the 2nd Sword Division stood unbroken.
name: Gear_Armor_Heavy_2ndSwordDivision_Shoulders

description: Armor for your caravan.
name: Caravan_Armor_Acacia

description: A customized caravan carriage.
name: Caravan_Carriage_Acacia

description: Supports the structure and functionality of your caravan.
name: Caravan_Chassis_Acacia

description: A customized wheel for your caravan.
name: Caravan_Wheels_Acacia

description: This heavy plate bears the sigil of the Acadira Valarion--the eternal guardians of Carphin University's hallowed halls.
name: Gear_Armor_Heavy_AcademusMonitor_Chest

description: Once draped over the shoulders of campus sentinels?before the gates broke, before the stars turned. Its folds remember more than they reveal.
name: Gear_Armor_Light_AcademusMonitor_Back

description: Iron-wrought battle cuisses like these bore the weight of endless patrols, guarding corridors filled with the whispers of long-lost scholars.
name: Gear_Armor_Heavy_AcademusMonitor_Legs

description: Forged for flexibility and defense against those who stood between the quest for knowledge and the chaos that sought to consume it.
name: Gear_Armor_Heavy_AcademusMonitor_Waist

description: Gauntlets like these were worn by stalwart defenders pledged to stand against those who would desecrate the halls of learning.
name: Gear_Armor_Heavy_AcademusMonitor_Hands

description: These greaves echoed throughout the marble corridors of Carphin, between great libraries and lecture halls long since turned to rubble.
name: Gear_Armor_Heavy_AcademusMonitor_Feet

description: Pauldrons like these endure the yoke of duty--first as protection against petty threats, then against agents of the apocalypse.
name: Gear_Armor_Heavy_AcademusMonitor_Shoulders

description: The visor of a seamless helm like this framed the sharp eyes of the guards who stood against the demonic invaders from The Void.
name: Gear_Armor_Heavy_AcademusMonitor_Head

description: Engraved with sigils of knowledge and duty to shield Carphin?s scholars from threats both mundane and arcane.
name: Gear_Armor_Heavy_AcademusMonitor_Forearms

description: A ceremonial weapon turned instrument of order, once wielded by those who enforced conduct with consequence at Carphin's great academies. It was never meant for war--until war arrived.
name: Gear_Weapon_Staff_1H_Carphin

description: A customized caravan carriage.
name: Caravan_Carriage_AdornedKaelar

description: A rugged, dependable tool turned weapon, carried by those who've stopped asking questions and started clearing their own path. It's not a hero's blade--it's a survivor's rejoinder.
name: Gear_Weapon_Axe_2H_Starter

description: Waist armor created with adventure in mind. Ready to traverse the world of Verra!
name: Gear_Armor_Light_Starter_Waist

description: These boots are stitched together from a single thread, beginning with a single spiral under the heel, like the start of a story.
name: Gear_Armor_Light_Starter_Feet

description: Though its edge is dull, the rune just beneath the guard glows faintly when magic courses through it. It's not elegant--but it answers when called.
name: Gear_Weapon_Dagger_1H_Starter_M

description: A magical Focus designed for beginning spellweavers, constructed with a balancing crystal in the center to prevent surges of wild magic that might cause novices to lose control.
name: Gear_Weapon_Focus_OH_Starter

description: The fabric is plain, but sits like it remembers a finer cut. It does not proclaim you a hero. It simply asks if you're ready.
name: Gear_Armor_Light_Starter_Chest

description: These leggings remember the rhythm of travel better than most companions. They don't resist the journey. They request it.
name: Gear_Armor_Light_Starter_Legs

description: This lightweight, unassuming weapon is favored by wanderers, scouts, and those bold enough to face the wilds before they've fully earned their name. It's not legendary, but it might help you survive your first few weeks on Verra.
name: Gear_Weapon_Shortbow_2H_Starter

description: A shield shaped by magic from a stained desk. Its wooden surface, once etched with notes and doodles, is now scarred with deep gouges and cracks. Spilt ink has fused with spilt blood, creating intricate patterns that writhe and shift.
name: Gear_Weapon_Shield_OH_Carphin

description: This scorched and blackened shield once faced the wrath of flame and refused to burn. It doesn't gleam, it doesn't shine--it endures, quietly and grimly.
name: Gear_Weapon_Shield_OH_Firebrand

description: A style of waist armor favored by warriors and kings, its links forged with purpose, its buckle bearing the seal of dominion.
name: Gear_Armor_Heavy_AelanChainmail_Waist

description: Weighty boots of conquest and wisdom, in the style originally forged by the greatest civilization Verra has ever known.
name: Gear_Armor_Heavy_AelanChainmail_Feet

description: Of a style worn by warriors of the Aelan Empire, these bracers know no master but duty.
name: Gear_Armor_Heavy_AelanChainmail_Forearms

description: A thousand interwoven rings, each a link to a golden age when the Aelan Empire stood unchallenged--a testament to a legacy that time cannot shatter.
name: Gear_Armor_Heavy_AelanChainmail_Chest

description: Hands wearing gloves like these signed decrees that shaped an empire with a reach as vast as the stars.
name: Gear_Armor_Heavy_AelanChainmail_Hands

description: Heroes witnessed the rise and fall of an empire through the steel slits of helms like this.
name: Gear_Armor_Heavy_AelanChainmail_Head

description: These tempered rings once clothed those who built an empire on wisdom and steel, never faltering, never failing.
name: Gear_Armor_Heavy_AelanChainmail_Legs

description: These broad pauldrons carried the burdens of Aela's great warriors--protectors of knowledge and empire alike.
name: Gear_Armor_Heavy_AelanChainmail_Shoulders

description: Farming basket for collecting raw food.
name: Bag_Basket_AelanFarmingBasket

description: A perfect basket for collecting herbs.
name: Bag_Basket_AelanHerbalismBasket

description: Property of King Jarrak. United in purpose, unyielding in strength.
name: Gear_Weapon_Sword_1H_Jarraks_3

description: Those that refused to make arms and armor to fight their own countrymen were killed on the spot. Those that cooperated died shamed and tired.
name: Gear_Artisan_Armorsmithing_Shirt_T3_Befallen

description: Those that refused to make arms and armor to fight their own countrymen were killed on the spot. Those that cooperated died shamed and tired.
name: Gear_Artisan_Armorsmithing_Pants_T3_Befallen

description: Those that refused to make arms and armor to fight their own countrymen were killed on the spot. Those that cooperated died shamed and tired.
name: Gear_Artisan_Armorsmithing_ToolBelt_T3_Befallen

description: Cloak granted to elite Aithanahr citizens. Prosperity to Aithanahr!
name: Gear_Armor_Medium_RoyalAithanahr_Back

description: Light Cloak with protection from the elements
name: Gear_Armor_Light_AlAshals_Back

description: A shipment of tinctures
name: Commodity_T1_Alchemy

description: A shipment of rare infused potions.
name: Commodity_T2_Alchemy

description: A fine beast trained to pull caravans.
name: BeastOfBurden_Alligator

description: Belt of ambitious academic's for beginner students who wish to increase their mage skills. Grants magical and physical mitigation.
name: Gear_Armor_Light_AmbitiousAcademic_Waist

description: Soft-soled for silence in both libraries and ruins. Hidden pockets in the tounge hide secret missives or emergency funds.
name: Gear_Armor_Light_AmbitiousAcademic_Feet

description: Fashioned from supple leather and treated with charms, light scratches heal before they?re even noticed.
name: Gear_Armor_Light_AmbitiousAcademic_Forearms

description: Woven to flow behind, never in the way. It carries the faint scent of old paper and damp stone corridors.
name: Gear_Armor_Light_AmbitiousAcademic_Back

description: The fingertips are reinforced--not for blades, but for careful page-turning and precise incantations.
name: Gear_Armor_Light_AmbitiousAcademic_Hands

description: Not a helm, exactly--more a structured cap of leather with brass fittings. It blocks rain and sun, but never deep  thought.
name: Gear_Armor_Light_AmbitiousAcademic_Head

description: Triple-stitched seams for sudden scrambles and poorly-timed revelations.
name: Gear_Armor_Light_AmbitiousAcademic_Legs

description: Nothing on this belt was placed there by accident. Every pouch has a purpose; every loop a reminder.
name: Gear_Armor_Light_AmbitiousAcademic_Shoulders

description: Designed for freedom of motion, whether casting or climbing. A hidden seam offers easy access to concealed scrolls or potions.
name: Gear_Armor_Light_AmbitiousAcademic_Chest

description: The only significant trait of this necklace is the grave visage that hangs at the neck of the bearer, and the voice of death that whispers through their accursed throat.
name: Gear_Accessory_Necklace_WhisperingWinds

description: The Council of Zaran met within the far dunes of the Sandsquall. They ventured far from their homelands to discuss matters lost to the wind. All that hints of their existence are whispers and the amulets worn by each council member.
name: Gear_Accessory_Necklace_Dom

description: The cold steel of the dagger felt alien in his hand. Urik had only ever used them for skinning and slicing meat before. Yet, as he crept through the shadowed deep-halls of the Anvils, its hexagonal blade reflected a new, grimmer purpose. Urik had never dreamed he'd be an assassin, and yet...
name: Gear_Weapon_Dagger_2H_AncientDunzen

description: Old Dunzen forging techniques were the greatest in recorded history. To recover even a mundane piece made during the height of their forgecraft is a windfall for any adventurer.
name: Gear_Weapon_Focus_OH_AncientDunzen

description: Old Dunzen forging techniques were the greatest in recorded history. To recover even a mundane piece made during the height of their forgecraft is a windfall for any adventurer.
name: Gear_Weapon_Sword_2H_AncientDunzen

description: Old Dunzen forging techniques were the greatest in recorded history. To recover even a mundane piece made during the height of their forgecraft is a windfall for any adventurer.
name: Gear_Weapon_Longbow_2H_AncientDunzen

description: Old Dunzen forging techniques were the greatest in recorded history. To recover even a mundane piece made during the height of their forgecraft is a windfall for any adventurer.
name: Gear_Weapon_Sword_1H_Zammer

description: Old Dunzen forging techniques were the greatest in recorded history. To recover even a mundane piece made during the height of their forgecraft is a windfall for any adventurer.

description: Old Dunzen forging techniques were the greatest in recorded history. To recover even a mundane piece made during the height of their forgecraft is a windfall for any adventurer.

description: Old Dunzen forging techniques were the greatest in recorded history. To recover even a mundane piece made during the height of their forgecraft is a windfall for any adventurer.

name: Gear_Weapon_Book_2H_AncientDunzen

description: Old Dunzen forging techniques were the greatest in recorded history. To recover even a mundane piece made during the height of their forgecraft is a windfall for any adventurer.
name: Gear_Weapon_Sword_1H_AncientDunzen

description: Old Dunzen forging techniques were the greatest in recorded history. To recover even a mundane piece made during the height of their forgecraft is a windfall for any adventurer.
name: Gear_Weapon_Wand_1H_AncientDunzen

description: Stitched from the sturdiest leather, these boots are more than mere footwear; they are a ward against creepers underfoot. Doubled layers and reinforced ankle guards embrace the wearer's calves, ready to fend off the slashing teeth of feral grem.
name: Gear_Armor_Medium_Grembabies_Feet

description:
Carved from duskwood and lacquered with bloodsap, it darkens with each beast brought low. Legend has it this bow fires truer under moonlight.

You can only switch tools while inside a Node.
name: Gear_Artisan_Hunting_Tool_Bow_T2_0

description:
An iconic tool used solely by hunters.

You can only switch tools while inside a Node.
name: Gear_Artisan_Hunting_Tool_Bow_T2_1

description:
An iconic tool used solely by hunters.

You can only switch tools while inside a Node.
name: Gear_Artisan_Hunting_Tool_Bow_T2_2

description: An iconic tool used solely by hunters.
name: Gear_Artisan_Hunting_Tool_Trap_Prototype

description: This lightweight, durable shirt offers freedom of movement and breathability for long hours in the lab. With reinforced sleeves and discreet pockets, it's perfect for storing essentials while you mix your next potion.
name: Gear_Artisan_Alchemy_Shirt_T2

description: Crafted from breathable weave and toughened thread, these pants offer comfort without sacrificing utility. Deep, vial-sized pockets hint at a life lived between formulas and fire.
name: Gear_Artisan_Alchemy_Pants_T2

description: This sturdy, moisture-wicking shirt is tailored for comfort and ease of movement during long hours with livestock. With roll-up sleeves and spacious pockets, it keeps essentials close at hand while ensuring you stay cool and protected.
name: Gear_Artisan_AnimalHusbandry_Shirt_T2

description: Stained by sun and soil, these rugged trousers know the rhythm of hoof and breath. Reinforced knees and deep pockets anticipate care, struggle, and renewal.
name: Gear_Artisan_AnimalHusbandry_Pants_T2
